name: miscarried
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
miscarry
If a woman miscarries, her baby dies because it is born before it has fully developed: Sadly, she miscarried eight weeks into the pregnancy. She miscarried her first baby. See
miscarriage
More examplesFewer examplesHer friend had recently miscarried.She miscarried at 22 weeks.Up to 30% of pregnancies are miscarried.
